mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_level, m_mail, m_black, m_phone) VALUES (#{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_level}, #{m_mail}, #{m_black}, #{m_phone})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE m_id=#{m_id} and m_pw=#{m_pw}
SELECT * FROM member WHERE m_name=#{m_name} AND m_mail=#{m_mail}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE m_id=#{m_id} AND m_pw=#{m_pw}
